BBEX3.A.ZMK.EUR.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Zambia  / EUR 1 = ZMK ... (buying)

General: With effect from 1 January 2013, a currency conversion took place at the rate of 1,000 (old) kwacha = 1 (new) kwacha; the new ISO currency code is ZMW. The currency conversion did not entail any appreciation or depreciation against other currencies.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
